hahahahah,


I resolved it my self. It happened to me cause, as I said, po=
wer went off. I guess the crawler was peersisting a file when the power wen=
t off. So when I saw the jobs folder, it had a junk file.

I deleted it and=
 "devaru dayedinda" it started working again.


Dodda Tika
